description: Deedlit the Elf and Parn, in his armor of the Knights of Tessius, have returned to Wort's tower in Moss, where Ghim the Dwarf reveals the secret of Karla the Grey Witch's immortality ? she has taken over the body of an innocent girl! Can our heroes defeat the Grey Witch without killing Leyla? And at last our heroes learn the nature of the dark pact Wort has struck with the Grey Witch.

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: The Grey Witch

description: The basis for one of the most popular anime series ever, Grey Witch offers adventure, magic, and mystery from the pen of Ryo Mizunu, with superb art by Yoshihiko Ochi. Deedlit the Elf and the heroic knight Parn ride at the head of the forces of Valis in a battle with Marmo that will determine the fate of all Lodoss! Swords cross and giant animal-shaped war machines clash on the battlefield, until finally King Fahn and King Kashu meet in a contest of champions. Who will carry the day? Will the Grey Witch intervene? You'll never guess the surprising outcome!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: The Grey Witch

description: It's the end of the road for the Grey Witch... or is it? In the climactic final issue of the saga of the Grey Witch, Parn and his friends and battle-tried companions meet Karl, the Grey Witch, head-on in a confrontation that will awaken ancient powers of sorcery! Will they be able to awaken Leylia, the young girl whose body Karla has stolen in order to stay alive and continue her evil schemes, or will the Grey Witch triumph? Will Ghim make the supreme sacrifice to defeat the evil witch? Lodoss will never be the same after the heroes make their final stand against her dark and ancient evil sorcery. More adventure, magic, and mystery from the pen of Ryo Mizunu, with superb, woodcut-inspired art by Yoshihiko Ochi.

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: The Grey Witch

description: Deedlit the Elf... the most beloved character in all of fantasy manga and anime... at last stars in her own series! Fans will go wild for this exciting new series starring top Lodoss favorites, Deedlit and Parn, the Heroic Knight! Not only is this the first Lodoss series to star Deedlit ? it is also a series illustrated by famous shoujo artist, Setsuko Yoneyama, creator of the Endless Waltz shoujo series! As fans expect from Lodoss, this series is action-packed as Deedlit and Parn join forces with a movement to free an oppressed village from aristocratic overlords. But it's also a moving shoujo comic, with plenty of character development, as Deedlit and Parn share a cottage near the village, and their relationship grows and deepens. The issue includes an interview with famed voice actress Lisa Ortiz, who is not only Deedlit, but also Lina Inverse from Slayers!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Deedlit's Tale
Record of Lodoss War: Deedlit's Tale

description: Deedlit the Elf and Parn the Knight have joined with a movement to free an oppressed village from aristocratic overlords. They have met with the townspeople, who have aired their grievances and then retired for the night. But during the long night, Deedlit is suddenly awakened by a scream! One of the villagers has been attacked, and Deedlit and Leylia (of Grey Witch fame) run to his aid. This remarkable new comic series brings together two top Japanese creators: Ryo Mizuno, the popular American convention guest and the creator of all the fabulous Lodoss stories, and Setsuko Yoneyama, the famous shoujo (girls' and womens' comics) artist, creator of the Endless Waltz manga series. Special feature: the issue includes continues an interview with famed voice actress Lisa Oritiz, who is not only Deedlit, but also Lina Inverse from Slayers!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Deedlit's Tale

description: Deedlit, the Elf heroine, and Parn, the knight whom she loves, are reunited at last in this all-new, character-driven series. The villagers of Zaxon are oppressed by their aristocratic overlords, and must decide whether to take up arms or lose their lives. Parn and Deedlit are trying to help, but everything is complicated by another High Elf, Estas, who has long known Deedlit. In this moving deeply moving issue, Deedlit tells Estas of her feelings for Parn and Estas shocks her deeply when he says that he has always been in love with her! The issue includes an interview with famed voice actress Lisa Oritiz, who is Deedlit, as well as Lina Inverse from Slayers!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Deedlit's Tale

description: Deedlit, the Elf heroine beloved by fans of the Lodoss anime and manga series, and Parn, the knight whom she loves, are reunited at last in this all-new, character-driven series. The villagers of Zaxon are oppressed by their aristocratic overlords, and they must decide whether to take up arms or lose their lives. Parn and Deedlit are trying to help, but everything is complicated by the appearance of another High Elf, Estas, who has long known Deedlit. In this deeply moving issue, Deedlit tells Estas of her feelings for Parn and Estas shocks her deeply when he says that he has always been in love with her!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Deedlit's Tale

description: Deedlit, the Elf heroine beloved by fans of the Lodoss anime and manga series, and Parn, the knight whom she loves, are reunited at last in this all-new, character-driven series. The villagers of Zaxon are oppressed by their aristocratic overlords, and they must decide whether to take up arms or lose their lives. Parn and Deedlit are trying to help, but everything is complicated by the appearance of another High Elf, Estas, who has long known Deedlit. Deedlit has come to understand the true depth of her own feelings for Parn, after Estas has confessed his love, and she returns to Parn with a new wisdom about her own emotions. It's Deelit as you've never seen her before, brought to life by two fabulous creators, Ryo Mizuno, creator of stories, and Setsuko Yoneyama, the famous shoujo (girls' and womens' comics) artist, creator of the Endless Waltz manga series. Special feature: the issue includes continues an interview with famed voice actress Lisa Oritiz, who is not only Deedlit, but also Lina Inverse from Slayers!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Deedlit's Tale

description: Deedlit, the Elf heroine beloved by fans of the Lodoss anime and manga series, and Parn, the knight whom she loves, are reunited at last in this all-new, character-driven series. The villagers of Zaxon are oppressed by their aristocratic overlords, and they must decide whether to take up arms or lose their lives. Parn and Deedlit are trying to help, but everything is complicated by the appearance of another High Elf, Estas, who has long known Deedlit. Deedlit has come to understand the true depth of her own feelings for Parn, after Estas has confessed his love, and she returns to Parn with a new wisdom about her own emotions.

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: Deedlit's Tale

description: The Lady of Paris is tale of Lodoss's past, and gives a little more insight into the history of the island.

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: The Lady of Pharis

description: The Lady of Paris is tale of Lodoss's past, and gives a little more insight into the history of the island.

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: The Lady of Pharis

description: Flaus, Wort, and Beld decide to travel from Moss to Allania in search of the legendary King Fahn. En route they encounter an injured dwarf who tells them of trouble in the highlands and a new demonic presence threatening the island. We also meet the beautiful maiden, Niece, who has traveled to Allania in order to find a way to conquer the evil embracing Lodoss.

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: The Lady of Pharis

description: The stunning female messenger that arrived to carry Neese to Allan proves that she has the brawn to back up her beauty! She fights off evil creatures of all kinds to protect her envoy. And in Allania itself, King Flaive calls a Council of Arms to address the growing threat of Darkness that is assailing Lodoss. But his meeting may have come a bit too late as the Dark Beast awakens and sets his sights on the accursed island!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: The Lady of Pharis

description: The Lodoss War history lessons continue. The pressure is on, and getting to several members of the war party. There¹s dissension in the ranks as Fahn squares off against Flaus for leadership of the group. But is Fahn in control of his own actions or is he simply a puppet under the control of evil forces?

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: The Lady of Pharis

description: The horned god appears and puts the warriors of Lodoss to their ultimate test! Will their combined powers be enough to stand up to this all-powerful monstrosity? Things take a turn for the worse as Beld is the first to fall! And just who is this nameless female warrior, and does she have Lodoss' best interests in mind?

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: The Lady of Pharis

description: As the battle rages in the land of Roid, Flaus, Beld and Wort fight for their lives. But will all their struggles have been in vain? In Valis, the lords of the dragonlands of Mycen seek vengeance for the attack on their palace. Believing it was Fahn who slaughtered their army, Mycen want retribution, not knowing it was really an evil doppelganger. Will the political wranglings between Valis and Mycen only serve to strengthen the forces of evil? Story by Ryo Mizuno. Art by Akihiro Yamada. And be sure to check out the Record of Lodoss War: Chronicles of the Heroic Knight video series in the Video Section this month!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: The Lady of Pharis

description: The final issue of this best-selling Lodoss War series! Believing they have defeated evil and won the battle, the island of Lodoss begins to celebrate its victory. However, the main celebration in the capital is cut short by the evil witch who still lives! The joyous occasion quickly turns into a bloody battle as Beld, Fahn and Flaus yet again take up their swords. Will this festival turn into their funerals? Find out as the Lady of Pharis concludes!

volume.name: Record of Lodoss War: The Lady of Pharis
Record of Lodoss War: The Lady of Pharis

description: Interrupted by a strange sound while playing the latest Silent Kill game, Migo, Mica, and Mona discover a dead girl on the Kwik Mart's roof. Their lives are sent into a maelstrom of confusion, freakish aliens, precipitous resurrection, and enigmatical secrets. Hang on for a wild ride into the unimaginable and astonishing... a random encounter!

Finding himself in a hospital bed after the epic battle with the monster in the previous issue, Migo wakes to another battle with a new, mysterious monster. When another strange person named Gummy decides to elaborate on the monster phenomenon, Migo and company are left with more questions than answers. Adventure, intrigue and excitment continue as Random Encounter explodes into the comic shops again.

As Migo begins to learn about the monster phenomenon and the legend of the Tree of Nede, a faint memory begins to surface. He rushes back to the Kwik Mart to look for something his father left him. As he arrives, he finds a big monster trying to demolish the Kwik Mart. Let the miniboss battle begin!

Migo and the others can't kill the monster that's been terrorizing them. Just as all seems lost, Migo's father shows up to help. After slaying the monster, Migo's father shows him what the monster was searching for.

description: When Clark rescues his centuries-lost cousin Kara from her prison, he must decide where he stands. Because EarthGov and New Krypton are at war, and the Legion is caught in the middle!
